title: Information Literacy Framework-Based Education for AI Literacy Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Usage Skills and General Understanding of Scientific Fields
context.additional_context: Learners must understand and critically evaluate AI technology applications in science as general citizens. Requires self-directed learning in asynchronous online environments, with material sharing and assignment submissions via LMS

learning_goals: Learners can explain fundamental principles of generative AI technology and its application cases in scientific fields
Learners can apply methods to evaluate the credibility of AI-generated content using information literacy frameworks
Based on ethical AI usage guidelines, learners can propose responsible strategies for leveraging AI in scientific research

resources: Database of AI applications in science disciplines
BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) support guide

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
